TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit OperationMessageCollection extends System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionBaseCollection
Public NotInheritable Class OperationMessageCollection Inherits ServiceDescriptionBaseCollection

summary.span: Representa una colección de mensajes y relacionados con un servicio Web XML.

span.span: Represents a collection of and messages related to an XML Web service.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Se devolverá una instancia de esta clase por el propiedad del elemento primario .An instance of this class will be returned by the property of the parent . Por lo tanto, puede tener exactamente dos miembros, uno un y el otro un .As such, it can have exactly two members, one an and the other an . ## Examples [!code-cpp[OperationMessageCollection_Sample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/OperationMessageCollection_Sample/CPP/operationmessagecollection_sample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[OperationMessageCollection_Sample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/OperationMessageCollection_Sample/CS/operationmessagecollection_sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[OperationMessageCollection_Sample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/OperationMessageCollection_Sample/VB/operationmessagecollection_sample.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks Si el número de elementos de la colección ya es igual a la capacidad de la colección, se duplica la capacidad reasignando automáticamente la matriz interna antes de que se insertó el nuevo elemento.If the number of items in the collection already equals the collection's capacity, the capacity is doubled by automatically reallocating the internal array before the new element is inserted. Si el `index` es igual al parámetro , el `operationMessage` parámetro se agrega al final de la colección.If the `index` parameter is equal to , the `operationMessage` parameter is added to the end of the collection. Los elementos después del punto de inserción se desplazan hacia abajo para alojar el nuevo elemento.The elements after the insertion point move down to accommodate the new element. ## Examples [!code-cpp[OperationMessageCollection_Sample#8](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/OperationMessageCollection_Sample/CPP/operationmessagecollection_sample.cpp#8)] [!code-csharp[OperationMessageCollection_Sample#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/OperationMessageCollection_Sample/CS/operationmessagecollection_sample.cs#8)] [!code-vb[OperationMessageCollection_Sample#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/OperationMessageCollection_Sample/VB/operationmessagecollection_sample.vb#8)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks Este método realiza una búsqueda lineal; por lo tanto, el tiempo medio de ejecución es proporcional al .This method performs a linear search; therefore, the average execution time is proportional to . Los elementos que siguen agregado se desplazan hacia arriba para ocupar el espacio libre.The elements that follow the removed move up to occupy the vacated spot. ## Examples [!code-cpp[OperationMessageCollection_Sample#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/OperationMessageCollection_Sample/CPP/operationmessagecollection_sample.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[OperationMessageCollection_Sample#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/OperationMessageCollection_Sample/CS/operationmessagecollection_sample.cs#7)] [!code-vb[OperationMessageCollection_Sample#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/OperationMessageCollection_Sample/VB/operationmessagecollection_sample.vb#7)]
